title: Dispelling the myths of homeopathy
author: Dr Shantanu Abhyankar
description: Dr. Shantanu Abhyankar unravels the mystery of homeopathy and leaves us with a valuable lesson that should, in reality, be well-known to the common man.
cleaned_text: | TEDxPICT September 2017 Dr. Shantanu Abhyankar unravels the mystery of homeopathy and leaves us with a valuable lesson that should, in reality, be well-known to the common man.
